name: InfographicsShow-SaveMarineLife
0:
”Alexa, open Save Marine Life”
”Alexa, start Save Marine Life”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: save marine life
des:
This skill is an Infographic show which explains how marine lives are impacted by human activities. It also explains different methods you as an individual can contribute to reduce the pollution and help marine life!

Best viewed on devices with displays.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
